sources.title: Eternally Yours
sources.description: When a magician's act takes precedent over his marriage, his wife gives him trouble. Stars Loretta Young and David Niven.

sources.title: Eternally Yours (1939)
sources.description: Anita, engaged to solid Don Barnes, is swept off her feet by magician Arturo. Before you can say presto, she's his wife and stage assistant on a lengthy world tour. But Anita is annoyed by Arturo's constant flirtations, and his death-defying stunts give her nightmares. And forget her plan to retire to a farmhouse. Eventually, she has had enough and disappears. Watch on RetroFlix:  https://retroflix.org/eternally-yours-1939/

sources.title: Eternally Yours
sources.description: When a magician's act takes precedent over his marriage, his wife gives him trouble. Stars Loretta Young and David Niven. Originally uploaded by kotic There is some cool footage of the Trylon and Perisphere from the 1939-1940 worlds fair.

sources.title: Eternally Yours (1939) David Niven
sources.description:
Starring: David Niven, Loretta Young, Broderick Crawford
Co-starring: Eve Arden, Zazu Pitts, Billie Burke
Directed by: Tay Garnett

In this magical romantic comedy, a dashing escape artist steals the heart of a beautiful bride-to-be while performing at her bridal shower. But when the magician refuses to give up the showbiz life, she performs a disappearing act of her own! Gloriously filmed using the 1939 World’s Fair as a backdrop and features an Academy Award-nominated score.

metadata.Plot: Anita, engaged to solid Don Barnes, is swept off her feet by magician Arturo. Before you can say presto, she's his wife and stage assistant on a world tour that seems never to end. Anita is mildly annoyed by Arturo's constant flirtations, but his death-defying stunts give her nightmares. As for her plan to retire in a farmhouse, forget it. Finally, she's had enough and disappears for real...
metadata.Writer: Gene Towne, C. Graham Baker, Edward Childs Carpenter
metadata.Actors: Loretta Young, David Niven, Hugh Herbert
